rogervdkimmenade wrote:
> Hello,
> 
> I was wondering if there is some kind of standard way to describe a
> RESTful API? Has somebody done this already and can give examples?

Whether the protocol is for internal or external consumption is moot; a
protocol is a protocol is a protocol. There is no standard way, but there are
exemplars you can follow.

Good models are the Atom Publishing Protocol's provisional spec[1], and the
example spec given in Paul James's article, 'A RESTful Web service, an
example'[2].

K.

[1] http://bitworking.org/projects/atom/
[2] http://peej.co.uk/articles/restfully-delicious.html
